author: Simon Difford
description: Your choice of sherry greatly affects the finished cocktail I we ummm'd and ahhhh'd between dry oloroso, palo cortado, and amontillado sherries before settling on the slightly richer palo cortado, but any of these sherries produce a delicious cocktail.
name: Psychopathia Sexualis

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
